name: World Financial Group
overview: World Financial Group (WFG) is one of the few companies of its kind in the industry today: WFG is dedicated to serving the financial needs of individuals and families from all walks of life. One difference about WFG is that its associates have the ability to offer products and services from a broad array of financial services providers - this allows our associates to find the very best solution for their clients. These solutions can come in many different forms, including insurance protection, lifestyle changes, or securities products, offered through our affiliated broker-dealer, World Group Securities, Inc. WFG’s independent associates do not just work with clients who have large amounts of discretionary income - they work with everyday people to help them make critical financial decisions that help move them from where they are to where they want to be. To learn more about WFG, go to WFG-online.com.
